name: Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa
description: Flagship contemporary art museum in the V&A Waterfront's Silo District.

name: Watershed Art Market
description: Design and art market inside the V&A Waterfront's Watershed building.

name: A4 Arts Foundation
description: Non-profit arts space with rotating exhibitions and research library.

name: Stevenson Gallery
description: Established contemporary gallery on Buitenkant Street.

name: WHATIFTHEWORLD Gallery
description: Curated contemporary gallery in Woodstock's industrial district.

name: Goodman Gallery Cape Town
description: Kloof Street gallery showing leading African contemporary artists.

name: Iziko South African National Gallery
description: National collection of historical and contemporary South African art.

name: Norval Foundation
description: Sculpture garden and galleries focused on modern African art in Steenberg.

name: Ellerman House Art Gallery
description: Private hotel collection with noteworthy South African works.

name: Michaelis School of Fine Art
description: UCT fine art campus studios and project space on Hiddingh Campus.

name: Old Biscuit Mill Makers & Art Studios
description: Cluster of design studios and art stalls inside the Old Biscuit Mill.

name: Woodstock Street Art Corridor
description: Dense run of murals along Albert Road and surrounding side streets.

name: Company's Garden Sculpture Walk
description: Historic park featuring memorials and public sculptures.

name: V&A Waterfront Public Art Route
description: Outdoor sculptures and installations linking the marina boardwalks.

name: Battery Park Skate & Art Walls
description: Urban park with murals overlooking the canal and skate plaza.

name: City Hall Mandela Balcony & Mosaics
description: Civic landmark with commemorative balcony art and plaza mosaics.
